title: Buying a car this festive season? Companies would want you to
description: Car sales in India have been declining, but automakers are optimistic about the upcoming festive season boosting demand. Discounts, promotional offers, and new model launches are strategies used to clear unsold inventory. The industry's recovery, however, hinges on consumer sentiment and economic factors.
